tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Belgian GP 2012 Start Crash - All Angles in HD
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Belgian Grand Prix 2012: Lotus's Romain Grosjean handed one-race ban for part in first-bend carnage Romain Grosjean has been handed a one-race ban for his part in the first-corner pile-up during Sunday's Belgian Grand Prix. His team Lotus confirmed the punishment had been handed down by race stewards after he appeared to be at the centre of the crash at La Source. McLaren driver Lewis Hamilton was clipped by Grosjean as he attempted to cut across the Briton. As the rear-right tyre of Grosjean's car hit the front-left of Hamilton's, it sparked a chain reaction which resulted in the exit of four cars. As the mayhem unfolded Grosjean and Hamilton collected Fernando Alonso and Sergio Perez, the latter duo having started from fifth and fourth. On-board replays showed Grosjean's Lotus flying over the front of the Ferrari, missing the head of the Spaniard by inches.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Is very easy﻿ to solve Grosjean problems and crashes. It's just let him start only in lap 2. Almost every race he crashes at the 1st lap. Starting on lap 2, problem solved. Now, seriously, this guy is fast, but he is putting the life of other drivers in danger. He was fired from Renault becase of his crashes, and now, is the same history. He sould be banned for the safety of the sport.
outperformed kimi when in quali quali doesn't give points u dumb fuck kimi is destroying him in the standings. stop watching f1 u r as dumb as﻿ they come quali more important thsn the race gtfo kid
start from pitlane is more﻿ reasonable.
HOOOOOOOLY SHIIIIIIT﻿
Grosjean is ﻿ idiot
Grosjean matou a pau!!!!﻿ Muito obrigado!
Why was Grosjean even there? He veered into﻿ him for no reason...
Grosjean and Maldonaldo should both get race bans﻿
where﻿ is HD??? thumb down
Grosjean you french﻿ turd

Are you blind? From Hamilton's onboard you can clearly see that Grojean drove into Hamilton, with contact between Grosjean's right-rear and Hamilton's front-left sending Hamilton onto the grass and out of control. It's no coincidence that Grojean is the one to receive a 1 race ban, one of the most﻿ severe driver reprimands in recent memory.
Yes it is but maybe you can think maldonado crashes!I think﻿ he has reach the 50 crashes already!!!!!!!!!!!
Seria algo bueno para﻿ Sauber, Grosjean............ gracias
Grosjean got a race ban and a 50 000€ fine, that's﻿ all﻿ he deserves! poor lewis
yes let's forget all the times this﻿ year he's done a solid job for Lotus and outperformed Kimi... -,-
Hamiltons﻿ fault...
lol so it's﻿ Grosjean's fault that Hamilton twitches his car into him?
Grosjean... What a﻿ jerk!!
you﻿ are dumb, no other words for that.

See when Hamilton does actually cause something like this (for once it wasn't him here, though this footage cuts in too late to show Grosjean coming right over), he gets called a Hero for it... and yes, I have see that happen and I'm NOT exaggerating. Here I am seeing same as when anyone else causes a crash (like Maldonado, who is demonised where Hammy is celebrated).
I cannot work out WHY Grosjean goes over toward the wall like that, didn't look like avoiding KOB's car or anything.﻿
